Hi <@UB093PZ39> if you give me more information on how the popup works, I might be able to help you. is it on click on a button? for example when clicking a button a popup form appears? and what does the popup contains? is the popup global (implemented on all pages or just on a single page)?

I have some modules created but i don´t know how to link them to the right image, and how to create them from zero

well, in this case I suggest do the following: 
1. you need some CSS and JS skills for that
2. create your popup like normal and stick it to the window with position:fixed; (the popup class is 'popup-wrapper')
3. after your popup looks good and you are satisfied with it, hide it by adding: visibility:hidden; opacity:0; z-index:-1;
4. add a trigger class to an element (button/image) ` <img class="popup-trigger" src='http://yourimageurl.svg' /> `
5. using some JS, when clicking the trigger add a class to the popup ` $('.popup-trigger').on('click', function(){ $('.popup-wrapper').addClass('popup-open') }) ; `
6. now that you know when the popup is suppose to open, add the following rules to the 'popup-open' class in css: visibility:visible; opacity:1; z-index:5;
